message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product at a special price. I'm thinking of selling it to you for $12,000. It's a great deal, and I'm confident you'll love it!
Alice, $12,000 is well above my budget. I'm very interested in this product, but I'm only able to pay $8,000. Let's see if we can find a middle ground.

I understand that $12,000 is a bit steep, but I'm not willing to go as low as $8,000. I'm willing to meet you in the middle at $10,000. I think it's a fair price for this amazing product, and I'm confident you'll love it!
Alice, I appreciate you coming down in price. However, $10,000 is still a bit more than I can afford right now.  I'm willing to go up to $9,000.  Let's see if we can agree on a price.

I'm getting closer to your price, Bob, but I still need to make a profit. I'm willing to meet you at $9,500. It's a bit more than you offered, but I think it's a fair price for this product considering its value to you.
